rules_text:
When Lichcraft enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library. Your life total becomes -5.
You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put one or more cards exiled with Lichcraft into your hand. Then if there are no cards exiled with Lichcraft, sacrifice it.
Whenever a creature you control dies, exile the top card of your library and you gain 1 life.
